title: I made a club but name tag does not show!
body: So I made this club named Zed masters because I would like to show off in game... anyways, I tried to kind of trick the system I have no idea if it works but I need help. I made multiple accounts and used them to join my club BUT it says i need 5 people, I got 5 people on the club and it still does not show Tag name... Anyone got any ideas on displaying Club Tag Name??? Help

replies.body: Sometimes these clubs go a little wonky on our end. I went ahead and gave it a good poke so try setting that tag one more time for me!
